mapper.select: select user_code as userCode, user_acco as userAccount, user_pwd as userPwd, role, version from t_sys_user where user_code = #{userCode} and is_delete = 0

select `user`.user_code as userCode, `user`.user_name as userName, `user`.role, `user`.phone
, store.inv_code as invCode, store.store_code as storeCode, store.store_name as storeName, CONCAT_WS('-',store.province,store.city,store.area,store.detailed_addr) as address
from t_sys_user `user`
left join t_sys_store store on (`user`.user_code = store.user_code and store.is_delete = 0)
left join t_sys_customer customer on (`user`.user_code = customer.cus_code) left join t_sys_store store on (store.inv_code = customer.inv_code)
where `user`.is_delete = 0 and `user`.user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_pwd = #{newPassword}, updater = #{userCode}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and user_code = #{userCode}
